text: Menginap 3 malam di Hotel Ayola Lippo Cikarang dan sangat puas. Hotel ini mempunyai lobby yang cukup luas, dan mempunyai design modern minimalis. Saya di upgrade ke Executive room yang luas, nyaman dan sangat bersih! Kamar mandi mempunyai bathtub dan rain shower. Breakfast nya bervariasi dari hari ke hari dan tidak membosankan, rasanya pun enak. Semua staff yang saya temui sangat ramah, pelayanannya cepat dan helpful dari reception, housekeeping sampai staff di restoran. Free WIFI dan cepat. Menu Ngariung di restorannya yang saya coba enak dan sesuai dengan lidah saya. Sangat recommended, well done!
title: Clean & Comfortable Hotel

text: Pertama kali ke Indonesia, dan hotel yang pertama (Ayola Lippo Cikarang). Training trip to Greenland Industrial Area, Cikarang from 5th ~ 8th Sept 2022. First day sampai Seokarno Airport Terminal 3. Hotel driver lambat sampai sikit, then jumpa kat pick up point. Don't want to ask why he late, maybe we can understand the traffic. Anyway my second impression comes from the driver itself. He pay back his debt. Such a good manner (Widi), we keep talking until reach hotel. For 6 days staying there, it is just a good experience of customer service delivered by all the staff, starting from the driver, front desk, room service, restaurant waiter/es. Keep it up guys. However, there's still have room for improvement. 1st) My towel and bed sheet have stain mark (i believed it's clean, only a mark). 2nd) Provide travel adaptor in each room (I use 3 pin power socket). 3rd) Speed up a bit the checking out process. 4th) Saya tidak jumpa tempe during breakfast :), The rest.....mantab. Insyallah akan kembali lagi to explore. Semoga dipertemukan lagi with the great environment. Salam gaiss.
title: Antara Yang Terbaik

text:
I  stayed at this hotel  during my short visit to Cikarang. I was working remotely during odd hours, and 100% jetlagged (12 hours difference from my home). However, my hotel room was comfortable, spacious, and cozy. You'll find many restaurants in front of the hotels for you to peruse. In the morning, some of the vendors serving delicious breakfast. For this, you can skip the breakfast offering at the hotel. It was decent, nothing to write home about. 
Wifi was relatively 'fast' without hiccup during my working hours. 
The front desk was professional and courteous, but don't expect 5* service at this hotel. You get what you pay for.
title: It feels cozy and comfortable

text:
A 3 star hotel that feels like a 4 star that explains this particular hotel in lippo Cikarang. The area of the hotel is very safe, location is great, room is clean and comfortable. Facilities is more than enough to accomodate guest. 

The restaurant and breakfast have varieties of delicious Food compare to other hotels around the area. The rooftop bar has great ambiance and comfortable place to relax and chill out with friends. The spa is fantastic and relaxing as well as the gym with adequate equipment for short term stay. 

There is no swiming pool but other facilities is enough for business traveler. Most importantly the bed here is very good and the room is so comfortable to stay! The staff are also very polite, friendly and helpfull!

Definately will stay in this hotel again in the near future!
title: Great Hotel with good service and design!
